title: Data Upload
subtitle: Import JSON files with HCP data

dropzone.dragDrop: Drag and drop a JSON file here, or

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.line1: The system accepts JSON files with _id or id_hcp as identifier.
instructions.line2: Files can contain a single object or an array of HCP objects.
instructions.line3: Existing fields will be updated; new records will be created.

messages.successWithErrors: Upload complete! {{count}} records processed, {{errors}} with errors.
